mdRecord.dcterms:title: Claytor-Ingram-Via Cemetery, Courthouse Dist
mdRecord.dcterms:description: This cemetery is in a field 500 yards behind 976 Franklin Pike SE. access is by a driveway next to the abandoned Pine Creek Church which is adjacent to 940 Franklin Pike SE. Go by the church and make a 90' turn to the left and proceed past a brick home to the edge of the tree line. Turn right on a farm lane to the cemetery site. It is visible using Google Earth or Google Maps. N 36 54.559 W 80 16. 142'
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Lists
Cemeteries
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
